meanings.definition: Plain or simple in design or style.
meanings.sent1: The unornamented room had white walls and a wooden floor.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the unornamented look of minimalistic furniture.
meanings.sent3: The unornamented cake was a hit at the party, proving that simplicity can be elegant.
meanings.sent4: Her unornamented speech resonated with the audience, who appreciated her straightforward approach.
meanings.sent5: The unornamented landscape stretched out before them, a serene expanse of untouched beauty.

meanings.sent1: The unornamented dress was perfect for the casual event.
meanings.sent2: The unornamented walls of the gallery allowed the artwork to stand out.
meanings.sent3: His unornamented car may not be flashy, but it gets the job done.
meanings.sent4: The unornamented truth hit him hard, stripping away all illusions.
meanings.sent5: The unornamented book cover hinted at the simplicity of the story within.
